articles.title: NASA NEO surveyor: All about the mission set up to prevent mass extinction on Earth - Republic World
articles.description: NASA' NEO surveyor mission will see the launch of a space telescope to monitor asteroids bigger than 140 metres (460 feet) in size.

articles.title: Researchers Develop Coating Material from TiO2 Nanocrystals to Produce Light-sensitive, Rewritable System - AZoM
articles.description: Researchers have succeeded in developing a coating material that can be written on with UV light and then removed with oxygen. Modifications on rewritable paper might help cut down on paper waste in a number of settings.

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: How moonlight fine-tunes animal reproduction - Phys.org
articles.description: Animals possess circadian clocks, or 24-hour oscillators, to regulate daily behavior. These typically take their cues from the periodic change of sunlight and darkness. However, many animals are also exposed to moonlight, which reoccurs with ~25h periodicity.
